backend/main.mo: Motoko canister storing submitted contact messages with validation and functions to submit, clear, and retrieve messages.
feature_evidence.json: Report mapping feature updates to affected frontend component files with metadata for tracking and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing functionality of each main frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining OKLCH color tokens for light and dark modes plus global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting document metadata and mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Wraps HomePage with React Query and theme providers and includes toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/AboutSection.tsx: Animated two-column About section describing the developer and ICP benefits with feature icons.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Contact form with validation, backend submission via React Query, animations, and social links excluding GitHub.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer showing static attribution text.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Hero section with parallax background, headline, subtitle, and animated three-step process cards.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Responsive navigation bar with scroll detection, smooth section scrolling, and mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/components/PortfolioSection: Displays a grid of animated project cards with tier-based styling and images triggered by intersection observer.
frontend/src/components/PricingSection.t: File is empty and contains no implementation.
Renders a services section with fade-in animations and descriptive text about custom business applications.
frontend/src/contexts/LanguageContext.ts: File is empty and contains no implementation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, including login, logout, identity loading, and status management.
frontend/src/hooks/useInView.ts: Custom hook using IntersectionObserver to report when an element enters or leaves the viewport.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines a mutation hook that submits a message through the backend actor and refreshes message queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind config and CSS variables defining light/dark themes, brand colors, and utility animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React Query and Internet Identity provider before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page assembling all sections and tracking active section based on scroll position for navigation highlighting.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, current feature updates, pending requests, and details for modifying text and removing a GitHub link in a portfolio site.
